Q_DESC:
Declare variable me and you as an integer. Declare average a float and assign it the average of me and you. 

Input the age of two friends and find the average age of the two friends

Refer sample input and output in the test-cases
TESTCASE_1:
40
30
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
I am 40
You are 30
We are around 35
TESTCASE_2:
30
30
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
I am 30
You are 30
We are around 30
TESTCASE_3:
90
10
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
I am 90
You are 10
We are around 50
